Control Name: 3.1.6 The application is implemented with strategies for resiliency and self-healing.Strategies for resiliency and self-healing include retrying transient failures and failing over to a secondary instance or even another region.
Control Statement: When an application calls a remote service leveraging a synchronous call, some of resources on the client (i.e caller thread, network socket, etc) are blocked and unavailable for use elsewhere until the remote service invocation completes.
